terms_intro_content: Welcome to Blood Donation. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the Blood Donation mobile application and all related services. By accessing or using our app, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our app.
terms_eligibility_content: To use the BloodLine app, you must meet the following criteria:
terms_eligibility_point1: Be at least 18 years of age or have parental consent
terms_eligibility_point2: Provide accurate, truthful, and complete information about yourself, including your health information
terms_eligibility_point3: Comply with all local laws and regulations regarding blood donation
terms_eligibility_point4: Have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms
terms_account_content: When creating and maintaining an account on our platform, you agree to:
terms_account_point1: Keep your account information up-to-date and accurate at all times
terms_account_point2: Maintain the security of your account and password, and immediately notify us of any unauthorized access
terms_account_point3: Take full responsibility for all activities that occur under your account
terms_account_point4: Not transfer your account to another person without our prior written consent
terms_conduct_content: As a BloodLine app user, you agree not to:
terms_conduct_point1: Use the app for any illegal purpose or in violation of any local laws
terms_conduct_point2: Submit false or misleading information about yourself or your health status
terms_conduct_point3: Harass, intimidate, or harm other users or blood recipients
terms_conduct_point4: Impersonate any person or entity, or misrepresent your affiliation with any person or entity
terms_conduct_point5: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems or other users' accounts
terms_donation_content: Regarding blood donation activities on our platform:
terms_donation_point1: You must meet all medical and legal requirements to donate blood in your jurisdiction
terms_donation_point2: You agree to follow all guidelines and procedures provided by blood collection centers
terms_donation_point3: The app serves as a coordination tool only and does not guarantee suitability for donation
terms_donation_point4: We reserve the right to suspend accounts of users who repeatedly fail to meet donation appointments
terms_ip_content: All content on the BloodLine app, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio clips, and software, is the property of BloodLine and is protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not use, reproduce, distribute, or modify any content from our app without our express written permission.
terms_liability_content: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, Blood Donation shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from your use or inability to use the service.
terms_termination_content: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease.
terms_changes_content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. If we make material changes, we will notify you through the app or by email. Your continued use of the app after such notice constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
terms_contact_content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@blooddonation.com.
privacy_intro_content: Blood Donation is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application. Please read this policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this policy, please do not access the app.
privacy_collect_content: We collect several types of information from and about users of our app:
privacy_personal_point1: Name, email address, telephone number, and other contact details
privacy_personal_point4: Profile pictures and other content you voluntarily provide
privacy_health_point3: Basic health information that may affect donation eligibility
privacy_health_point4: Any allergies or medical conditions you choose to disclose
privacy_usage_point1: Information about how you use the app, including login times and features accessed
privacy_usage_point2: Device information like IP address, device type, operating system, and browser type
privacy_usage_point3: Location data when you search for nearby donation centers or blood requests
privacy_use_content: We use the information we collect about you for various purposes, including to:
privacy_use_point1: Facilitate blood donation matching and coordination
privacy_use_point3: Provide you with notifications about blood donation opportunities and requests
privacy_use_point4: Improve our app and user experience
privacy_use_point5: Monitor and analyze usage and trends to improve functionality
privacy_use_point6: Communicate with you about updates, security alerts, and support messages
privacy_share_content: We may share information we have collected about you in certain situations, including:
privacy_share_point1: With blood banks and healthcare facilities for donation coordination
privacy_share_point2: With blood requesters, limited to necessary contact and blood type information
privacy_share_point3: With third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf
privacy_share_point4: If required to do so by law or in response to valid legal requests
privacy_security_content: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your personal information, including:
privacy_security_point1: Encryption of sensitive personal and health information
privacy_security_point3: Strict internal data access controls and monitoring
privacy_retention_content: We will retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. We will retain and use your information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
privacy_rights_content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
privacy_rights_point1: The right to access the personal information we have about you
privacy_rights_point2: The right to request that we correct inaccurate or incomplete information
privacy_rights_point3: The right to request deletion of your personal information
privacy_rights_point4: The right to withdraw consent for processing your information
privacy_rights_point5: The right to request restrictions on how we use your information
privacy_children_content: Our app is not intended for children under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.
privacy_changes_content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make material changes, we will notify you through the app or by email prior to the changes becoming effective. Your continued use of the app after we post modifications to the Privacy Policy constitutes your acknowledgment of the modifications and your consent to abide by them.
privacy_contact_content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@blooddonation.com.
